AnnouncementBar.alert-text: This site is under development and will be officially launched on February 10, 2025.

newsletter.newsletter_description: Building Together to Drive Cardano Forward.

pageDReps.longDescription: Delegated Representatives (DReps) are ADA holders who registered on-chain to allow other members of the community to delegate their voting power to them, so that they can vote on their behalf. They are are like 'parlimentary representatives' in the Governance system.
pageDReps.search: Search DReps by name or ID

pageGovernanceActions.longDescription: Anyone that has ADA in a wallet can propose a Governace Action. To submit a Governance Action, the submitter pays a refundable deposit of 100,000 Ada. The deposit will be returned automatically back to the submitter's wallet upon completion of the Voting period.

pageGovernanceActionsDetails.votes-submitted-by: Votes submitted for this Governance Action By
pageGovernanceActionsDetails.longDescription: Anyone that has ADA in a wallet can propose a Governace Action. To submit a Governance Action, the submitter pays a refundable deposit of 100,000 Ada. The deposit will be returned automatically back to the submitter's wallet upon completion of the Voting period.

pageProposals.longDescription: danilo Participate in discussions and decision-making processes guided by community governance.

pageCommittees.longDescription: Meet the Cardano community members who are participating in all existing committees.

pageLiveEvents.longDescription: See all governance events in real time.

pageAnalytics.governance-delegation-desc: ADA taking part in Governance as of today by category in relation to the circulating supply of ADA on Cardano.

pageHelp.longDescription: All-in-One Governance Platform. Cardano Voltaire CIP-1694 Offical Transparency & Community Portal.
pageHelp.question_1-1: Ways to use your Voting Power?
pageHelp.answer_1-1: Every ADA holder has an amount of Voting Power equal to the amount of Lovelace they have in a wallet. When you link a wallet containing ADA to GovTool, GovTool will read the ADA balance in the wallet, and make it available to you to use as Voting Power. Voting Power can be used in several ways: Delegate your Voting Power to a DRep, How to delegate your Voting Power.
pageHelp.answer_1-2: For ada holders voting power refers to the amount of ada they own. For registered DReps Voting Power refers to both to the voting power they own and to the voting power that other ada holders have delegated to them.
pageHelp.answer_1-3: We define seven different types of governance actions. A governance action is an on-chain event that is triggered by a transaction and has a deadline after which it cannot be enacted.
